modal.headline: Wallet & Account settings
modal.caption: Settings for your wallet (shared among accounts within) and account specific settings (active account)

wallet.headline: Wallet Overwrites
wallet.caption: Changing these settings will overwrite settings of ALL wallet accounts.

account.headline: $t(settings:headerAccount)
account.caption: These account settings overwrite wallet settings.

walletNameGroupPassword.label: Name, Group and Password
walletNameGroupPassword.caption: Update your wallet name, group name or spending password.
walletNameGroupPassword.name: Wallet Name

walletEntity.label: Reporting
walletEntity.captionWallet: Set the name of the entity this wallet belongs to, e.g. a company name or "personal."
walletEntity.captionAccount: Set the reporting type of this account.
walletEntity.isAllIncomeHover: All incoming funds are counted as income without asking for manual checks.
walletEntity.isPassThroughHover: Not immediately counting transactions as income. If funds are sent to another account, they will be counted as income there.

accessPassword.label: Wallet Access Password
accessPassword.caption: Set a wallet access password, update or delete a current access password.
accessPassword.captionUnlock: Tries to unlock the wallet using entered the access password (not the spending password).
accessPassword.captionUnlockGroup: Tries to unlock all wallets in the wallet group using the entered access password.
accessPassword.captionMigration: After unlocking your imported wallet, it will be migrated to the new syncing system.
accessPassword.relock:
Wallet will be locked with current locking password.
 
You can change this under "Setting"
accessPassword.setLock: Set a wallet login password (This is for accessing your wallet, not your spending password!) You can change this under settings.
accessPassword.enterCurrent: Enter current access password to remove the access password.
accessPassword.removeFailed: Failed to remove wallet access password.
accessPassword.pwCheckFailed: The old lock password you entered is not correct.
accessPassword.settingsNotSaved: Access password settings could not be saved.
accessPassword.noPwUpdate: Access password could not be updated.
accessPassword.noLockSet: Can not lock wallet, no lock password is set.
accessPassword.wrongPassword: You entered a wrong wallet access password.

current.label: Enter current access password to remove the access password.

unlock.headline: @:common.label.unlockWallet
unlock.caption: After pressing this button you are asked for the wallet login password to unlock this wallet..

exports.label: Export Wallet
exports.caption: Options for account public key export & encrypted wallet JSON export that enabled easy import in other browsers/devices or to restore the wallet at a later point.

json.headline: $t('common:appName')Wallet Backup (JSON export)
json.caption: Exported $t('common:appName').json files can be imported in any other $t('common:appName')app.

accountPub.label: Export Account Key
accountPub.headline: Account public key export
accountPub.caption: Export the public key of this account. Importing a public key restores the account history in a read-only mode with signing disabled.

csv.headline: Export Transaction History
csv.caption: Export (per account) the transaction and rewards history as CSV file.

csvExport.label: CSV Export
csvExport.caption: Set your export preset and enable/disable the export functionality.

notes.label: Notes
notes.caption: Export transaction notes in the last column. The export will concatenate multi-line notes.

localTime.label: Export local timestamp
localTime.caption: Enable this if you want to export the transaction times in your local timezone and local format. Otherwise the timestamps will be exported as UTC time.

qr.headline: Wallet Export (QR-code)
qr.caption: This QR code can be scanned in any other instance of $t('common:appName.')It doesn"t export wallet settings, like the name.

collateral.label: Collateral
collateral.caption: Interacting with smart contracts can require collateral in case a transaction fails. This will be handled automatically by Eternl if a qualifying UTxO has been found, otherwise can be set with the "Set Collateral" button.
collateral.alreadySet: You have already set a collateral. It can be found in this UTxO ####utxo####
collateral.noCollateral: No collateral UTxO found. Please set one by pressing the button below.
collateral.foundCollateral: We"ve found a collateral UTxO for this account. It"ll be used when interacting with smart contracts.

error.label: Error!
error.buildOutput: One of the outputs needs at least ####amount#### to hold the tokens.
error.lowFunds: This means you have too little funds in your wallet to set a collateral. Please add more funds and try again or contact support if recurring.
error.insufficient: Your have insufficient funds in this account to set a collateral.

fundslow.label: Low funds for collateral
fundslow.text: Setting a collateral UTxO will use more than 10% of the funds you have in you account!

warning.headline: Collateral is an account based setting.

info.line1: $t(common:appName) can use any UTxO with no tokens and a value between ####minimumCollateral#### and ####maximumCollateral#### as collateral. When you activate this setting, it will look for a UTxO that is suitable. If none is available, a button will be shown to set one.

tag.label: collateral
tag.hover: This UTxO is valid as collateral for smart contract transactions.

global.label: Global Single Address Mode
global.caption:
Some wallets and tools only track a single wallet address, eg. Nami and CNTools. In contrast Daedalus, Yoroi and $t('common:appName')track all addresses of a wallet.

Enable this option to only use the first address of an account as change address. This prevents $t('common:appName')from automatically selecting a different, unused change address.

 If you activate SAM after you did a transaction with $t('common:appName')you will need to send all your funds and assets to your SAM receive address, so the wallet is again Nami compatible.

receiveaddress.label: Custom Receive Address
receiveaddress.caption: Overwrite the automatically chosen receive address by setting your address manually.

notice.label: Please read carefully:
notice.text: When using Single Address Mode, the first receive address is used by default Don"t set a custom receive address if you don"t know what you"re doing. When changing this setting, this will only affect the current active account.

resync.label: Wallet Synchronization
resync.caption: Force a complete wallet re-synchronization.
resync.info: By pressing this button your wallet data will be reset and fully synced from the blockchain.

tokenfrag.label: Token Fragmentation (TF)
tokenfrag.caption: Split tokens into bundles on send if there are more tokens in change to be returned than set value. Depending on wallet UTxO/Token distribution and desired outcome, values might have to be tweaked for optimal result.

fragment.label: Token bundle size
fragment.info:
Sets number of tokens each UTxO output should contain. It\'s a tradeoff between low transaction fees and amount of funds locked in the wallet.
small bundle size -> low fees, more Ada locked.
large bundle size -> higher fees, less Ada locked.

withdrawal.label: Auto Withdrawal
withdrawal.caption: Automatically withdraw rewards if needed.
withdrawal.info: If enabled, rewards will automatically be withdrawn if needed when creating a transaction. If disabled or for forced manual withdrawal, use Withdrawal button on Summary page.

sendall.label: Enable "Send All"
sendall.caption: Sending all funds is considered dangerous as you might accidentally send away your whole wallet content. Only enable this feature temporally and when you need it.
sendall.info: If disabled, the button for sending all assets will not be available. If enabled you can send all your funds(including tokens) using "Send All" on send page.
sendall.tooltip: "Send All" feature can be enabled on the wallet settings page.

manualsync.label: Manual Sync
manualsync.caption: Manually synchronize the wallet. If enabled the wallet needs to be synced manually by clicking the sync icon.

historysync.label: History Sync
historysync.caption: Full transaction history synchronization. If enabled, when on transaction history page, all transactions of the account will start to synchronize. This can be useful for filtering to work fully but can take a long time for an account with a large history.

autoCleanup.label: Pending transactions: auto cleanup
autoCleanup.caption: If enabled, transactions that have been successfully submitted to the blockchain will be removed from the "Pending Transactions" view.

ledger.label: @:common.ledger.transport.label
ledger.caption: Set Ledger transport communication protocol.
ledger.info: To communicate with a Ledger device, the transport communication protocol has to be set. By default,  an automatic detection will be attempted with WebUSB as the primary transport. This setting allow you to override the default auto mode and set the transport you would like to use manually.
ledger.warning: This is considered an advanced feature. If unsure, leave on auto.

deletewallet.headline: Delete Wallet
deletewallet.caption:
Once you delete this wallet it will be removed from this $t('common:appName')app and you will lose access to any remaining funds in this wallet. The only way to regain access after deleting is by restoring your wallet recovery phrase or by importing a previously exported $t('common:appName').json file.

 For easier import, export as $t('common:appName').json format prior to deleting.

 Be sure that the seed phrase of this wallet is stored safely!

acknowledged.text: I understand that the only way to regain access to this wallet is by restoring it with its wallet recovery phrase.

name.label: @:common.wallet.name.label
name.hint: Enter the name of this wallet
name.info: To confirm the deletion of this wallet, please enter the wallet name.
name.error: The wallet name does not match.

deregwallet.headline: Un-Stake / De-Register Account
deregwallet.caption:
This action creates an account de-registration transaction. Once completed, the account will be un-delegated from any pool, and the key deposit from when the account was first delegated is returned.

Please note that any pending rewards from pool delegation, catalyst rewards, etc will be lost when the account is de-registered!

acknowledged.text: I understand that any pending rewards will be lost.
acknowledged.noutxo: Ada needed to pay for de-registration fee.

message.unlock: Unlock wallet to get access to all settings.
message.failed: Failed to save wallet setting, please retry.

namiMessages.notOwned: The address you entered is not your own. Please only enter addresses that belong to the current wallet.
namiMessages.nonStaking: You entered a External addresses (not delegated). You will not be able to stake with that address.

advancedUTxOManagement.label: Advanced UTxO Management
advancedUTxOManagement.caption: Enable this setting to use advanced UTxO management on your transactions by default.

verification.label: Recovery phrase verification
verification.caption: Verify that you have stored the correct recovery phrase for a wallet. Once verified, you can also change your spending password.

match.label: The entered recovery phrase is correct.

invalid.label: The entered recovery phrase is not correct for this wallet.

verification.wordLimit: A recovery phrase can have a maximum of 24 words.

recovery.label: Forgot access password ?
recovery.caption: If you forgot your wallet access password, restore your wallet with the same recovery seed phrase.

confirmModal.label: Restore wallet from recovery phrase?
confirmModal.text:
You already have a wallet with the same recovery phrase. If you"ve forgotten the access password and are locked out of your wallet, press confirm to overwrite the existing wallet.

If you confirm, the old wallet will be deleted and recreated.

This process will reset all wallet settings to default, including the wallet addressbook, icon, Single Address Mode, Token Fragmentation etc.

Before you start using the recreated wallet, make sure to edit the wallet settings. That is especially important if you used "Single address mode" with a custom change address or the Token Fragmentation feature.

recovery.unableToDelete: Existing wallet could not be deleted.

spendingRecovery.label: Set new spending password ?
spendingRecovery.caption: You can reset your spending password for this wallet if you have forgotten or lost it.

confirmModal.label: Set new wallet spending password?
confirmModal.text: Your current wallet spending password will be overwritten with the new one. Please confirm that you want to do this?

voterData.label: Catalyst Voting
voterData.caption: Saved Catalyst registration QR code.
voterData.info: Scan this QR code using the Catalyst voting application and follow the instructions.
voterData.warning:
Please Download/Save this QR code as a backup! 
We saved a local backup of the encrypted catalyst voting key if you lose it. But this is only a local backup, and it will not be there if you restore your wallet on another device using your wallet phrase. Only if you import from a JSON backup created after creating the Catalyst registration can it be restored. We strongly advise you to save it in a password manager.
voterData.error: Failed to generate QR code, please reload browser and retry wallet voting registration or contact support if recurring.

password.title: Wallet spending password
password.caption: Enter spending password to access the catalyst voting information.

current.label: Current wallet spending password
current.info: Enter the current spending password for this wallet.
current.hint: Enter the current spending password for this wallet.

password.wrong: The entered spending password is not correct.

mnemonic.info: Click "Show QR Code" and and enter your spending password to display your saved Catalyst registration QR code.

hardware.info: Connect and unlock your hardware wallet, then click "Show QR Code" to display your saved Catalyst registration QR code.

download.label: Download QR code
download.hover: Download QR code as a PNG image

name-password.caption: Update your wallet name, group name or spending password.

icon.caption: Set a custom wallet icon or generate a random wallet icon.

background.caption: Set a custom wallet background based on any NFT.

export.caption: Options for account public key export & encrypted wallet JSON export that enabled easy import in other browsers/devices or to restore the wallet at a later point.

delete-unstake.caption: Once you delete this wallet it will be removed from this Eternal app and you will lose access to any remaining funds in this wallet. The only way to regain access after deleting is by restoring your wallet recovery phrase or by importing a previously exported External .json file.
delete-unstake.delete-wallet-text: Once you delete this wallet it will be removed from this Eternal app and you will lose access to any remaining funds in this wallet. The only way to regain access after deleting is by restoring your wallet recovery phrase or by importing a previously exported External .json file. For easier import, export as Eternal .json format prior to deleting. Be sure that the seed phrase of this wallet is stored safely!
delete-unstake.delete-checkbox: I understand that the only way to regain access to this wallet is by restoring it with its wallet recovery phrase.
delete-unstake.deregister-wallet-text: This action creates a wallet de-registration transaction. Once completed, the wallet will be un-delegated from any pool, and the key deposit from when the wallet was first delegated is returned. Please note that any pending rewards from pool delegation, catalyst rewards, etc will be lost when the wallet is de-registered!
delete-unstake.deregister-checkbox: I understand that any pending rewards will be lost.
